name: QuarksPwDump Clearing Access History
description: Detects QuarksPwDump clearing access history in hive
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND event.code:16 AND winlog.provider_name:Microsoft\-Windows\-Kernel\-General AND winlog.event_data.HiveName:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\SAM* AND winlog.event_data.HiveName:*.dmp)`
